metadata.title: CVE-2020-23319 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: There is an Assertion in '(flags >> CBC_STACK_ADJUST_SHIFT) >= CBC_STACK_ADJUST_BASE || (CBC_STACK_ADJUST_BASE - (flags >> CBC_STACK_ADJUST_SHIFT)) <= context_p->stack_depth' in parser_emit_cbc_backward_branch in JerryScript 2.2.0.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
